title: Bug 42225: Can't assign command to Ctrl+Backspace
description: Bug 42225: Can't assign command to Ctrl+Backspace
OB: When trying to assign a command to the Ctrl+Backspace key combination, the keybinding manager recognizes it as Ctrl+Del and deletes the next word instead of deleting the previous word.
EB: Out of the box, Ctrl+Backspace should delete the previous word on a Swiss German keyboard using Swiss German Locale.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the key preference page.
2. Try to assign a command to Ctrl+Backspace.
3. Observe that the keybinding manager displays Ctrl+Del instead of Ctrl+Backspace and deletes the next word.
